U

um - Static variable in class edu.byu.rpg.systems.Mappers
The component mapper for UpdateComponent.
updatable - Variable in class edu.byu.rpg.components.UpdateComponent
The entity whose update logic should be executed in the game engine's update loop
UpdatableEntity - Class in edu.byu.rpg.entities.base
Any game object that implements this base class can is plugged directly into RpgGame.engine's core update loop, meaning it will have its UpdatableEntity.update(float delta) function called by the engine with each iteration of the engine's update loop.
UpdatableEntity(RpgGame) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.UpdatableEntity
Automatically registers this entity with RpgGame.engine
update(float) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.entities.base.UpdatableEntity
This is the update function for this entity.
update(float) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.entities.EntityStaging
 
UpdateComponent - Class in edu.byu.rpg.components
This component is added to any entity with update logic (any UpdatableEntity).
UpdateComponent(UpdatableEntity) - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.components.UpdateComponent
 
UpdateSystem - Class in edu.byu.rpg.systems
This system handles the game's core engine loop.
UpdateSystem() - Constructor for class edu.byu.rpg.systems.UpdateSystem
Automatically sets the priority to 0, meaning this system will be evaluated first on each update loop.
